text.text: You've served as the librarian in the capital.
You've seen all kinds of people enter and borrow books.
But it's not only books, it's also travelogues and drama scenarios.
Customers like to explore topics that are unique to them. One can tell a lot about a person based on the literature they read.
Your customers often write reviews upon returning the books which you also like to read about.
The tavern has a 'rich' library of books.
You've stored some of your books there too along with some book, exploration and review notes.
Take a look at (or between) those books again and see what you can conclude.
